DOC.brief_summary: Caesarean ( CS ) delivery rate Netherlands increase 5 15 % last 20 year . CSs clear benefit overall neonatal outcome associate higher maternal complication high cost . Dutch guideline offer clear recommendation factor direct effect decision perform CS . Hypothesis : incomplete adherence recommendation guideline CS among Dutch gynaecologist . This study consist four phase : 1 . Development quality indicator : A set quality indicator regard process , structure outcome care develop accord RAND-modified Delphi method . A representative , national expert panel consist 12 15 obstetrician midwife participate . 2 . Current care study : The current Dutch care study 20 hospital ( N=80 gynaecologist ) . 1000 file perform CSs analyze regard adherence develop quality indicator . To get insight Dutch practice compare international data , basic obstetrical data extract delivery database . 3 . Barrier analysis : A barrier analysis carry base result current care study . Two group hospital identify upper low extreme 'adherence distribution ' : 5 hospital lowest 5 hospital high adherence score . Factors determine decision perform CS ( barrier facilitator ) analyze group use semi-structured interview among 15-20 professional 15-20 patient . A questionnaire use study 'prevalence ' factor among obstetric gynaecologist Netherlands among 200 patient . 4 . Controlled before- and-after ( CBA ) study : Based outcome current care study barrier analysis , tailor make implementation strategy develop order increase adherence CS quality indicator . Target group select focus woman high incidence indicator low indicator adherence . The strategy execute evaluated CBA-study 12 hospital ( 6 intervention , 6 control ) term effectiveness , experience cost . The sample size dependent target group adherence quality indicator regard target group . These data available perform current care barrier study .
DOC.brief_title: Current Dutch Practice Caesarean Sections : Identification Barriers Facilitators Optimal Care
DOC.criteria: A previous caesarean section 34 month time period . Major congenital malformality Fetal death prior onset delivery Duration pregnancy le 24 week gestation
